Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier door problems on a train at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier door problems on a train at Roosevelt.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
